title: Install provisioning package
description: Generates a provisioning package and installs it on the device.

bprtName.description: The name for the bulk primary refresh token to be obtained from Key Vault and injected into the provisioning package.

namePrefix.description: The prefix for the DNS computer name that will be assigned to the virtual machine.

vaultSecret.description: The secret for the Azure Active Directory application used to access Key Vault.
